-  audioUnitShortName 

Instance Property# audioUnitShortName

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
var audioUnitShortName: String? { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/audioUnitShortName#see-also)

### [Describing the Audio Unit](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/audioUnitShortName#Describing-the-Audio-Unit)

[`var componentDescription: AudioComponentDescription`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/componentdescription)The component description with which the audio unit was created.[`var component: AudioComponent`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/component)The component found in the component description with which the audio unit was created.[`var componentName: String?`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/componentname)The audio unit’s component’s name.[`var componentVersion: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/componentversion)The audio unit’s component’s version.[`var audioUnitName: String?`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/audiounitname)The audio unit’s name, derived from the component’s name.[`var manufacturerName: String?`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/auaudiounit/manufacturername)The manufacturer’s name, derived from the component’s name.
